description: Mylene gets home late at night and checks the various video mail messages that Milia has left her. As the many messages play, Mylene falls asleep on her couch. The next morning, Mylene sings as she showers, and she later makes breakfast for herself. She thinks that it`s a beautiful morning and that something good will happen, but her mood instantly sours when she turns on the TV and sees Basara singing during a battle.

titles.title: グッドモーニング・ミレーヌ
